statements: SELECT * FROM FleetVehicles
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, location FROM FleetVehicles ORDER BY vehicle_name
SELECT * FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM FleetVehicles WHERE vehicle_id > 100 ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM FleetVehicles
SELECT * FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location='New York' ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC
SELECT COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_vehicles FROM FleetVehicles WHERE schedule='Maintenance'
SELECT vehicle_name, location FROM FleetVehicles WHERE location='Los Angeles' AND schedule='Available' LIMIT 5
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name, location FROM FleetVehicles WHERE schedule='In Use' ORDER BY location ASC, vehicle_id ASC
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM FleetVehicles
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT id, vehicle_name FROM vehicles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE destination = 'New York' AND departure_time >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, destination, arrival_time FROM schedules ORDER BY arrival_time ASC;
SELECT vehicle_name, location FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_name LIKE '%Bus%' AND status = 'Inactive';
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY vehicle_name DESC
SELECT vehicle_name, location FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM schedules INNER JOIN vehicles ON schedules.vehicle_id = vehicles.id WHERE destination = 'Los Angeles' AND departure_time > '2022-01-01 08:00:00'

SELECT vehicle_name, destination, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules INNER JOIN vehicles ON schedules.vehicle_id = vehicles.id WHERE location = 'Houston' AND status = 'maintenance' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE status = 'inactive' AND location != 'Chicago' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_name FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car';
SELECT vehicle_name, current_location, last_service FROM vehicles WHERE last_service > '2021-01-01';
SELECT driver_name, contact_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time, destination FROM schedules WHERE end_time > NOW();
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, current_location FROM vehicles WHERE last_service < '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicles.vehicle_name, schedules.start_time, schedules.end_time, schedules.destination FROM vehicles JOIN schedules ON vehicles.vehicle_id = schedules.vehicle_id;
SELECT drivers.driver_name, vehicles.vehicle_name FROM drivers JOIN vehicles ON drivers.assigned_vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE drivers.contact_number LIKE '%123%';

SELECT vehicles.vehicle_name, schedules.start_time, schedules.end_time, schedules.destination FROM vehicles JOIN schedules ON vehicles.vehicle_id = schedules.vehicle_id WHERE schedules.start_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_id FROM vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_id FROM vehicles WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, address FROM locations;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_name, location_id FROM vehicles WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT v.vehicle_name, l.location_name, s.start_time FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN locations l ON v.location_id = l.location_id INNER JOIN schedules s ON v.schedule_id = s.schedule_id;
SELECT v.vehicle_name, l.address, s.end_time FROM vehicles v INNER JOIN locations l ON v.location_id = l.location_id INNER JOIN schedules s ON v.schedule_id = s.schedule_id WHERE v.location_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM vehicles;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles;
SELECT vehicle_name, vehicle_type, last_location FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type='Sedan';
SELECT location_name, address, city, state FROM locations WHERE city='New York';
SELECT driver_name, contact_number, license_number FROM drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT route_name, start_location_id, end_location_id, distance FROM routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Sedan';
SELECT vehicle_name, last_location FROM fleet_vehicles WHERE last_schedule > '2021-01-01';

SELECT fleet.vehicle_name, locations.address, schedules.start_time FROM fleet_vehicles as fleet JOIN locations ON fleet.last_location = locations.location_name JOIN schedules ON fleet.vehicle_id = schedules.vehicle_id WHERE locations.city = 'New York';

SELECT drivers.driver_name, vehicles.vehicle_name, routes.route_name, routes.distance FROM drivers INNER JOIN vehicles ON drivers.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id INNER JOIN routes ON vehicles.vehicle_id = routes.start_location_id;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND state = 'CA';
